name: anybrowse
description: Autonomous web browsing agent. Converts any URL to clean, LLM-ready Markdown. Powered by real Chrome browsers with x402 micropayments on Base.

skills.name: Web Scraping
skills.description: Convert any URL to clean, LLM-optimized Markdown. Uses real Chrome browsers with JavaScript rendering.
examples: Get the content of this webpage as clean text

skills.name: Search and Crawl
skills.description: Search Google for a query and scrape the top results to Markdown.
examples: Search for 'latest AI news' and scrape top results
Crawl the web for information about a topic

skills.name: Web Search
skills.description: Google search results as structured JSON.
examples: Find web results for a query

author: anybrowse

pricing.details: x402 micropayments: $0.003 USDC per scrape, $0.005 per crawl, $0.002 per search. Payments on Base mainnet via USDC.
